title: add SolrCoreTest.testImplicitPlugins test
description: Various places in the code assume that certain implicit handlers are configured on certain paths (e.g. /replication is referenced by RecoveryStrategy and IndexFetcher). This test tests that the ImplicitPlugins.json content configures the expected paths and class names.
